ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry I can't help you locate this item... but I would really appreciate
hearing your thoughts on leveling... I'm currently haveing a lot of trouble.
I'm a level 9 wizard on fennin ro....

Georgeh@...
-----Original Message-----
From: James Guintu <james@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 18, 1999 4:22 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Best wizard equipment ! ! SPOILER


>From: "James Guintu" <james@...>
>
>I level till our guild's current level limit then usually help others level
>or look for items for our guild members. I do not play as much as some of
>the others in our guild yet when I need to, I can often out level or catch
>them very easily, and yes this includes even druids. I do not always use
my
>leveling techniques, as I like to adventure and hang out with and group
with
>others, but those that have seen me in action are impressed =) And no I do
>not exploit, I use our class' abilities in ways that other classes can not
>come close to...
>
>btw this is my 3rd char...
>
>James
>Euros Arcane - lvl 27 wiz - Rallos Zek
>
>
>
